description: More than 16,000 people attended the two-day event, up 6,000 on the previous highest attendance.
title: Thousands flock to Isle of Man Food and Drink Festival
title_page: Thousands flock to Isle of Man Food and Drink Festival - BBC News
maintext: The Department of Environment, Food and Agriculture (DEFA) event had been threatened by Covid-19, but was able to take place after social distancing measures were scrapped in June.
